thread.title: Chris Pratt Shares Cute Middle School Yearbook Photo
thread.title_full: Chris Pratt Shares Cute Middle School Yearbook Photo

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Chris Pratt Shares Cute Middle School Yearbook Photo
text:
Comments The 'Jurassic World' actor posted the throwback image on his Instagram as part of a new TV report, titled '#Being13: Inside the Secret World of Teens'. 
Chris Pratt took his Instagram followers by storm when he posted a throwback photo of himself at age 13. On Monday, October 5, the film hunk posted on the popular social media, his cute middle school yearbook photo. "Before selfies, this was what 13 looked like," 36-year-old Pratt captioned the snap. "#Being13 looks like this now: cnn.com/being13 So proud of my brother in law, friend and hunting partner Bob Faris for his involvement in this great project. Check it out!!" the " Jurassic World " actor added. A photo posted by chris pratt (@prattprattpratt) on Oct 5, 2015 at 5:19am PDT Pratt posted the throwback yearbook image to show support for wife Anna Faris ' brother Bob, who is a sociologist and professor at the University of California at Davis. Bob is co-collaborator of Anderson Cooper 360's special report "#Being13: Inside the Secret World of Teens". The CNN story explores how social media affects eighth graders. Cooper himself has shared on his Instagram page an old school pic of him. "This was me #Being13 Find out what it's like for today's 13 year olds online and off. Tonight 9pm on #cnn," he captioned it. A photo posted by andersoncooper (@andersoncooper) on Oct 5, 2015 at 2:25pm PDT
